actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend the civil service retirement provisions of title 5, United States Code, to allow credit for service performed by a special agent of the Bureau of the Census who was paid on a piece price basis.

summary.text: Allows credit toward retirement for service performed by a special agent of the Bureau of the Census who was paid on a piece price basis.

titles.title: A bill to amend the civil service retirement provisions of title 5, United States Code, to allow credit for service performed by a special agent of the Bureau of the Census who was paid on a piece price basis.
